Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Mummy mask with a golden face. A headband with a golden disc has been painted on the forehead. There is a winged scarab on the top of the head. On the front, only one goddess has been preserved, near the right ear (Isis ?). The back is blue and is decorated with a ribbon, knotted as a sa-sign (''protection'').
